meanings.definition: The quality of being worthy of attention or notice.
meanings.sent1: Her remarkableness in the classroom made her stand out among her peers.
meanings.sent2: The remarkableness of the painting captured the attention of all who passed by.
meanings.sent3: The remarkableness of his dance moves was so entertaining that everyone clapped and cheered.
meanings.sent4: The remarkableness of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The remarkableness of the waterfall cascading down the rocks left a lasting impression on the visitors.

meanings.definition: The state of being exceptional or extraordinary.
meanings.sent1: The team's remarkableness in winning every game amazed their fans.
meanings.sent2: His remarkableness as a musician was evident in every note he played.
meanings.sent3: The cat's remarkableness in catching mice with its paws instead of its mouth was both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The remarkableness of her intelligence shone like a beacon in the academic world.
meanings.sent5: The remarkableness of the meteor shower lit up the night sky with a dazzling display of shooting stars.
